# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/dos-diode.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dos-diode.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/dos-diode.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dos-diode.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dos-diode.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/exclude ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/exclude ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/unix-diode.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/unix-diode.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_689/dos-diode.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} dos-diode.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} dos-diode.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_689/dos-diode.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_689/dos-diode.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly")
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_689/unix-diode.cir COMMAND Xyce unix-diode.cir )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_689/unix-diode.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly")
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_689/unix-diode.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP unix-diode.cir)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_689/unix-diode.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} unix-diode.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_689/unix-diode.cir.prn unix-diode.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_689/unix-diode.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED unix-diode.cir)
